topic.title: ZeroNet & Decentralization Apps
topic.body:
Ok guys, time to raise the stakes. I'm currently working on a crypto-currency that will (for now) be the primary currency of my app. As time goes by, I'll give you more details on how it works, but the question is: Does an Arcade City style app work well on the ZeroNet network?

P.S.: If any of you guys is interested on the project, give me a shout ;)

1524481130_13kAufBz1uj9WtzbqWKkUkM8E1Y2S.body: Also, the project is underway as we speak.
I don't know, creating a Blockchain over ZeroNet don't seem impossible since all the seeds will be in everyones computer.
